name: FFFL
description:
NOTE:  THE FULL GAME IS FREE - The Demo is the full game.  The $10 DLC is a supporter pack that includes 2 new fantasy races - Fiends and Celestials

Join the FFFL DISCORD

Welcome to the FFFL! 

The FFFL is a Franchise Management Simulation game, based mostly on American Football in a Fantasy setting. The goal is to create a game that’s fun to watch and manage with lots of complexity and stat tracking. 

Thanks to the @King Javo and the great Legend Bowl community, I was inspired to make this game after working on a franchise mod for LB. Taking some of the LB ideas along with ideas from my mod I strove to create more of a simulation version of LB with some unique twists. The game is currently fully playable, but still in EARLY ACCESS to get feedback from users. 

FREE - the base game is free on itch.io.  There is a $10 one time DLC that adds 2 more fantasy races (Fiends and Celetials).  No more DLCs will be added, but more races or cosmetics may be added for those that own the DLC.  For the STEAM release, it may cost $10 but automatically include the DLC.

Primary Features: 

8 v 8 football, players play both sides of the ball 

Fantasy races: Orcs, elves, dwarves etc. 

True Simulations: Simulated games use the exact same engine as games watched at normal speed 

Total control of all teams, but you can assign AI to manage any aspect of the game at any time.  This also allows for Multiplayer Hot Seat and Multiplayer Streaming Leagues.

Rotating “Quarterback”, 3 downs instead of 4, no punting or kicking 

Player death, draft, unique off-season free agency similar to what we developed for LB, in season events, end of season awards, league records, career stat tracking, Hall of Fame 

Players have hidden personality traits that influence weekly events and free agency

In game Team Editor 

Team, Player, History, Coach and Schedule file that is fully moddable 

Continual Improvements 

Graphics, UI, AI, general presentation, prominence of player and coach personality 

Planned Updates: 

Modding of most game variables 

In memoriam at end of season to honor dead and retired players. 

Lore Screen for Races 

Possible Updates: 

Replay system 

Rivalry system 

Tournament Mode
